text:
@realDonaldTrump What a sad, sad “man” you are.

It had to rise after the historical crashes over the past several weeks.

It will go up.

And it will go down.

But one thing will remain consistent.

You will still be incompetent.

By the way, how is that @Google website coming along?

#COVID19
